item.name: Kirwan's Bridge Wines
item.address1: Lobb's Lane/Kirwan's Bridge Road, Nagambie, Vic 3608
item.description: A major development, with over 35ha planted: a major emphasis on the Rhne varietals (7.9ha marsanne, 2.7ha viognier, 1.3ha of roussanne; and 11.2ha shiraz, 2.7ha mourvedre and 2.5ha grenache). A side bet on 4.8ha cabernet sauvignon, 2.4ha merlot and 1.3ha riesling rounds off the planting. The cellar door complex includes a restaurant (open for lunch and dinner ThursSun), conference facility and art gallery.
